description: Breaks up larger images into smaller image files of user-defined size.

prefix.title: Prefix for output files
prefix.description: Prefix the output files with the provided string

xynum.title: X-first, then Y numbering
xynum.description: Number the output images in x-first, then y (default behavior)

yxnum.title: Y-first, then X numbering
yxnum.description: Number the output images in y-first, then x

nx.title: Nx (pixels)
nx.description: Number of pixels along the x-dimension for the smaller images.

ny.title: Ny (pixels)
ny.description: Number of pixels along the y-dimension for the smaller images.

input_file.title: Input file
input_file.description: Input image filename. Must be a single 2D image.
